Create a washing machine that uses solar power to operate, reducing the environmental impact of laundry.
Design a washing machine that uses artificial intelligence to optimize the washing process, reducing water and energy usage.
Create a washing machine that can clean different types of fabrics, including delicate items, without damaging them.
Develop a washing machine that uses biodegradable detergent and fabric softener to reduce the amount of harmful chemicals in the water supply.
Design a washing machine that can be controlled remotely using a smartphone app, allowing users to start and stop the washing process from anywhere.
